title: Drawing, Design for an Art Deco Lobby Interior with Two Green Chairs and Circular Table, ca. 1927
title_raw: Design for an Art Deco Lobby Interior with Two Green Chairs and Circular Table
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache, green watercolor, pen and gold ink on gray paperboard
markings: At upper right, large [2 3/8  x 1 1/2 in.] shield-shaped stamp in blue [date in red]:  KILEMNICK E CIA/ 524 FLORIDA/ 20 Oct. 1927/U. T. 31 [REC?] 3648
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right:  A; upper center, right:  168/C [encircled]
description: View of elaborate lobby interior with two green upholstered chairs and round table sitting on long rectangular fringed carpet.  Behind chairs, an arched mirror enframed with double gold band.  Panels of crystal/glass or wrought iron with stepped frames are on either side of arch and on wall at right.  On ceiling, a central rectangular dropped panel of wrought iron with panels on the two sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for an Art Deco Lobby Interior with Two Green Chairs and Circular Table, ca. 1927. Graphite, brush and white gouache, green watercolor, pen and gold ink on gray paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-15.
